headline: Press T to open the theme drawer
body: Try randomizing or picking a new vibe.

headline: Press + to add a new slide
body: You'll get options: title, standard, quote, gallery, and more.
Or hold **V** and describe what you want â€” it'll draft it for you.
Either way works. You're in control.

headline: Hold V when you're stuck on wording
body: Describe what you want to say, let go, and it drafts suggestions.
You can tweak, reject, or keep what it gives you.
It's a helper, not the author. You're still driving.

headline: Press D to export as JSON
body: Your deck exports to JSON â€” clean, portable, shareable.
Press **D** to export, or **U** to upload a deck from your computer.
Everything stays local in your browser unless you export it.
